snippet: The etching rate of p-GaN and AlGaN of the chosen recipe are 10 nm/min and 0.3 nm/min, respectively. title: Etching and heating treatment combined approach for superhydrophobic ...
snippet: Fig. 1 shows the static CAs of the brass etched with different time of 15 min, 30 min, 45 min, 60 min and 75 min in the etching solution before they were heated for 45 min and modified with 10% stearic acid for 10 s. The CAs of the surfaces with different etching time were 137.6°, 145.6°, 153.6°, 141.7° and 136.5°, respectively.

title: Min Xu Profile - Carnegie Mellon University
snippet: Dr. Min Xu is an Assistant Professor at the Computational Biology Department in the School of Computer Science at Carnegie Mellon University. He serves as training faculty at the Joint CMU-Pitt Ph.D. Program in Computational Biology. He also serves as a training faculty Master of Science in Computer Vision Program at Robotics Institute.
